entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I always wondered how Sonic watches this.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Nothing, I knew it. He's such an idiot--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Am I too soon?! I'm too soon!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Sonic?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I'm Old Man Sonic, I have to warn Sonic about something.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: He's making a vodka hotdog run.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ok I have to warn him about two things. Anyway tell him it's a waste of time! You need to tell him it's a waste-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What the hell was that about?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: We're going to College!!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What the hell man?! You crash land in here and start spouting this nonsense again?! I am so sick of your constant bullshittery.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: This time it's for real! I'm tired of doing shitty jobs for shitty pay. I want an education, a career, to be taken seriously for a change. And you better fucking believe I'm putting in the hard work!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Alright! Well lets start getting some applications and-

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Uuuugghhhhh this is impossible! Can't I just bang someone to get in? Is it you? Do I have to bang you Tails? Because I won't do that. Just like that Meatloaf song. You know, that song I sing whenever you make meatloaf.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Meatloaf is good, meatloaf never fails. I wanna go to college but I won't bang Tails. Yeah I know, let's just focus here for a second okay?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Whats the ETA on that meatloaf?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Look, we're not gonna just bang our way into college but I know somebody who might be able to help us.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Holy shit! This episode of Blossom is great!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: God dammit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Luigi?! How the hell is this fucking doofus gonna help us?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: I can hear you.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Oh no, this nobody can't help with shit, we're just gonna use him to find Mario.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: You're both very mean to me for no reason.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Absolutely. Look, Mario is the biggest donor at Console University State, if anybody can get us in, it's him. I just don't know where he is.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Why would I help you after you just insulted me to my face?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh hey Luigi. Cool...um...hat.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: A compliment? Nobody has ever complimented me before. You guys are my best friends!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Wow. Some serious trauma there.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hey, so do you know where Mario is?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Not yet best friends, I've been talking to the locals but they make me answer these impossible trivia questions.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Step aside I know how to talk to these Italian women.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey chest meatballs we're looking for our friend Mario, capisce?

entries.speaker: lady
entries.line: Pasta sauce is a sauce that is used on ____ .

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Shit you were right

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Told you! You gotta be Ken freakin' Jennings to win this game!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Morons.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: The answer is "food"

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What?!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: No, that's not the answer wait wait wait!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Dammit! It's not "food" dipshit!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: It's "Italian food"! GOD!

entries.speaker: lady
entries.line: You clowns shouldn't be allowed anywhere near a college campus. MARIO is RIGHT THERE!

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Oh hey there you are! I didn't think to look straight ahead.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Hey assholes.

entries.speaker: lady
entries.line: And the answer was "Meatloaf"

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Meatloaf! Callback!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Meatloaf! Callback!

entries.speaker: lady
entries.line: Okay here's a question I'm sure you'll know the answer to.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Hit me!

entries.speaker: lady
entries.line: Mario's less popular, less attractive, idiot brother is _____

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Everybody is so mean to Luigi. I'm gonna burn this world to the ground.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yo Tails, hit him with the exposition.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: On it! Hey Mario, we want to get into college without doing any of the work so we need you to get us into college.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Well as you know I'm the biggest booster at Console University--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Booster? Like a kid ghost?

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: A what?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Like a youngster but a BOO-ster.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: You know, like the movie Ghost Boo-sters.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Boo-sting makes me feel good!

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Did you guys want to get into college or what?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh right, yeah sure whatever.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Okay. Then I need you to do two things for me. First, win our athletic program some championships--

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: PIECE OF CAKE!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I mean... piece of cake for Sonic.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: And second, you can bring no shame to the university otherwise--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Otherwise what? You'll kill us, how did that work out for you last time.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Otherwise

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: I will kill your dead owl mom!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Wait, how are you gonna--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Don't push him Tails, it's a deal.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I can't believe I'm going to college! This is my chance to re-invent myself! I could be the white guy with dreads or the frat guy who takes the money and hands out the red cups, or the nerd who inadvertently builds a laser for the government --

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: How about the guy who does my work and rides my coattails!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: The stereotype options are endless!!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: What's going on here?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Uh nothing.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Wait a second, bean bag chairs, bathroom caddies, posters that can only exist in the room of an 19 year old, you guys are--

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Opening an Urban Outfitters!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: No they're going to college! Eggman they were gonna sneak off to college and not tell us. We want to go!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Sorry too late, we had to go all the way to Rome and have Mario call in a special favor in order--

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Actually, I've been a professor at Console University for the last twenty years.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What? Then why are you always hanging out here when you should be teaching?

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: I'm tenured dude, I'm untouchable. Plus I have Robo-Eggman.

entries.speaker: robot_eggman
entries.line: Beowulf hates Grendel but loves Grendel? NOT LOGICAL! ERROR! ERROR!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: And I'm a legacy there all I have to do is show up!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: We're going to College!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: We're going to College!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Are we there yet?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yes Jim. That's definitely the worst Ice Cube franchise. But also no, we're lost.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Let's ask these weirdos.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey kid...or 30 year old. Are you and frosty headed to Console University?

entries.speaker: boy
entries.line: No, we're going to Blobolonia.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What's that some sorta wrestling thing?

entries.speaker: blob
entries.line: It's my home planet. It's been taken over by an evil empire--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yeah that's terrible. So do you know where the University is?

entries.speaker: boy
entries.line: I do but we could sure use your help first.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ugh fine but let's make this quick.

entries.speaker: boy
entries.line: We only need to solve a series of puzzles it won't take but four or five hours. I will buy us some pizza afterwards.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Sounds more like I'm helping you move. And what's with this abomination over here?

entries.speaker: boy
entries.line: That's blob, if you give him jelly beans he turns into stuff to help us along the way.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Cool. Hey can you give me some jelly beans and those directions now in case we get separated?

entries.speaker: boy
entries.line: Oh right here you go and you'll keep going down that road you came from and it's your second left. Now let's get puzzling!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Eat bat loser!

entries.speaker: blob
entries.line: Can I come with you?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yeah sure! Just eat this first.

entries.speaker: blob
entries.line: What's this?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Sorry buddy, car is already chock-full of idiots.

entries.speaker: blob
entries.line: You could have just said n-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Did they give you directions?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yeah and I made a boo-ster and a ghost version of whatever the fuck that other thing was! Drive!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Outta the way I'm driving!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: It's my turn to be DJ! Ahem 2-3-4

entries.speaker: group
entries.line: If you wanna be my lover! You gotta get with my friends!

entries.speaker: group
entries.line: Friendship never ends!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Wooo! College! Cheap booze, casual sex, dudes playing 311 covers with acoustic guitars, 4 toilets for a floor of 60 guys, college is gonna be sick!! Now let's go check out our dorm room, which if the only part of Back To School I've ever seen is any indicator, will surely have a jacuzzi and a masseuse! Wooo!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What the fuck is this piece of shit?! C'mon Tails let's go talk to the concierge about getting an upgrade.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: They don't have those here. Also, I'm rooming with Jim.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What?! You're Superbad-ing me?!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: If by Superbad-ing, you mean launching the career of the captivating Emma Stone, then...no, I guess I'm not doing that. I just wanna spread my wings a bit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Spread your wings? You better not be Cash-Explosion-ing this season!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: You three lovebirds can sort this out on your own, I'm off to the teacher's lounge. Eggman cool exit to the left!

entries.speaker: student_voice
entries.line: You shattered my legs!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Don't worry, I used to teach here.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: So who the hell am I rooming with?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Looks like we're Roomin' and Groomin!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I'm not even gonna ask about the grooming part. Whatever, come on Knuckles, I saw a frat party down the road.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Have fun spreading your wings while Jim whacks it on the top bunk.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: I'm not saying that's not gonna happen.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Uh I'm looking for the dean?

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Hey there, I'm Dean Cain. And before you ask no I'm not that Dean Cain.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: I don't know who you're talking about.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Me either but everyone always asks so figured I'd get out in front of it. Now, what can I do for you? I do love helping the homeless but I will not give you money. You'll just use that to buy drugs. I WILL give you a sandwich though. You can trade that for drugs. Learn a skill.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: I'm not homeless, I've got tenure here. I came back to replace Robo-Eggman.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Oh, this literal flaming pile of shit is called Robo-Eggman? We've just been calling him Nick.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: What the hell kind of stupid name is Robot-Nick?

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: So I guess you work here again?

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Great. Now, where did we land on the drug sandwich?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Now, this is more like it! Let's live it up Knuckles!!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: College and Knowledge!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ugh, come on man.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Welcome to the party pal!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Die Hard! This maniac's been rippin' quotes all night!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: You know it! I'm college party guy Tails now--all movie lines, keg stands, and telling people how awesome I am at wiffle ball!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: First one down! And HELL YEAH did somebody say wiffle ball?! We wiffin' or what?!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ah man, what are you dorks doing here?

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: You choad bloaters here to pledge?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Dude, I already finished my first beer, I'M A MACHINE!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: It's in the hole!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: HAHAHA! Another quote! You absolute fucking psychopath maniac serial killer!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Okay, easy.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hmm, could it be fraternities are not as cool as I thought? Eh, whatever time to show these amateurs how to drink Sonic style. I'm gonna need cheap hookers, expensive crack, and a case of my home-brew I call Sonic Style.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Your Sonic Style is no match for my Tails... I don't really have a second part of that but you're going down!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Whoa ho ho! It's a pledge off! Yo! Diesel, Erection Bill, Provoloney Tony. Tell these newbies what they're up against!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I can do that.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hey didn't Kirby burn this place to the ground?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Maybe it's a franchise?

entries.speaker: tapper
entries.line: Nope, rebuilt it. And I spend every waking hour anxiously waiting for that pink psycho to return so I can slice his belly open in a final act of vengeance before embracing rest eternal!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Time to chug-a-lug!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I think I'm gonna be sick.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: What's that from Clerks 2?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: No. But I gotta hurl... Worse than after I saw Clerks 2. You'll have to win this one for us Jim.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Ut Uh - I already had my one college beer, I'm out!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Times up! Sonic and Knuckles are in! WOO!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Don't feel bad Tails, the party guy wasn't really your thing anyway.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Tails Ale...Dammit. Sonic Style is no match for my Tails Ale. But you're right this isn't for me, I've never even eaten a wiffle ball before.

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Tails and Jim are also in! WOO!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: HAHA! Wait what?

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: We desperately need the money! WOO!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: We're broke.

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Oh.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: BIKINI CAR WASH!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hello, Dean Cain?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Wait a minute...

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: THE Dean Cain from The Dog Who Saved Easter?!

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Dun dun dunnnnnnn

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh my god!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Dean Cain looks just like Mario!

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: I AM Mario you dummy.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ah yes, I see it now. Uh, so where's Dean Cain?

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Dean Cain is right here - oh my you're naked - And no I'm not THAT Dean Cain, you see-

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: HELLOOO!

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: They've heard this already. Where's my espresso?

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Here you go.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: What took you so long? I said I wanted it faster than a speeding bullet.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: I'm starting to think Dean Cain has something to do with Superman.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Agh, and this is too weak. I said stronger than a locomotive.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: That'll be all.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: I wouldn't push my buttons, Mario. One day you'll push the wrong button and I'll - just - go -- off.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: He seems nice. So what the hell are you doing here anyway?

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: I'm the school's biggest donor. So everybody knows who's in charge around here.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Is it the Dean? He seems nice.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Why do I ever talk to you

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Now Sonic do you remember why I got you into this school?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I dunno to build you a laser gun that can hit any target from space?

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Hmm actually that's not bad.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Recruit naive, young science nerds to build laser. No I got you into college because you promised to win this school some championships. And I'm looking around and you know what I see? I see NOT championships.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What? I've been here for like three days, have classes even started yet?

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Sounds like somebody wants their dead owl mom to be a DEAD dead owl mom.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: DAMMIT

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Alright I'll win you some championships. But I'm gonna need really something special in return.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Oh yeah, what's that?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: One of those lanyards for my keys.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: Okay.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Okay great thanks.

entries.speaker: mario
entries.line: I gotta order it - so...

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: It's cool, I'll wait.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Ooh what about the investment banking club?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Nah I'm already rich and besides being around a bunch of greedy, misogynistic, drug addicts... might make Sonic jealous.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: How about the Nature Club?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Nature club? What am I some crunchy, Earth first, spicy BO havin dork-wad?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hey I'm Fox, spotted your aura from across the quad.

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Hello there are you interested in joining Nature Club? I mean clearly you're an intelligent, eco-conscious, progressive, who happens to be super cute!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hahah, who me?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: HAHAHAH!

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Great then, I just need you to sign this waiver and you're in.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Why do we need to sign a waiver?

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: What's with the questions? Why don't you check out the Fishing club...I hear they're always looking for fresh bait.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: I think you mean "Fresh MEAT."

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Do I?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Stop being such a nervous nelly and sign the waiver, Jim.

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Aren't you the brave one!

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Great. We will start looking for opponents tomorrow morning. 8am sharp at the river side trail.

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Don't be late!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Did she say opponents?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Don't get me wrong, I love beerin' and cheerin' but do you think you should be partying this hard before you've even played a single game?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Relax Knuckles, you know how much money I'm gonna make this school. Besides what can possibly go wrong?

entries.speaker: student_01
entries.line: We're outta beer! Oh wait no we're not there's like 30 kegs over there.

entries.speaker: student_02
entries.line: Great! Nothing has gone wrong.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You see Knuckles, nothing can go wrong.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hey Hilda, sorry I'm late.

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: No problem cutie, you're right on time! I'm getting a nibble!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: No YOU'RE a cutie!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Wait, I thought Jim was going to meet us here. Have you seen him?

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: No.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Then why is his-

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Oh no! This fish is too strong for me! If only there was a strong and brave hero around to help me, I would be EVER so grateful...!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: IM A STRONG AND BRAVE HERO!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: HOLY SHIT! WHAT IS THAT THING?!?!

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Go! Twotails! Use Flamethrower!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Twotails? Flamethrower?! What are you talking about? We need to get the fuck out of here!

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: Stupid Pokemon, you wasted our turn!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: No, but seriously, WHAT IS HAPPENING!?

entries.speaker: hilda
entries.line: What don't you get? Its a death match between you and that wild sea dragon for my entertainment. AKA Nature Club.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Oh shit!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Jim?! What did you do? You killed hotty mc-hot pants!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: She used me as bait and was gonna let you die for her amusement!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yes...but she was totally into me!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I loved her.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Uh Mario, so glad you stopped by, I was just resting... I mean practicing for the carbo load...then I--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Phew I had nothing.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: That did not go well.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Who woulda thunk putting cameras in the sorority bathroom, selling pictures of them naked, and wearing a mask to pretend to be a girl's boyfriend to trick her into having sex were crimes?! How did 80s movies lead me astray!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Man you're not allowed to do anything anymore, fraternity life is lame, I'm gonna go get a job at the cafeteria.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Wait, wait, wait, there's still one thing left, a college tradition that's as old as time.

entries.speaker: erection_bill
entries.line: A game of soggy biscuit?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Rookie mistake. No I'm talking about starting a prank war with another school.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Prank wars are for dorks.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Hey hey hey! I just started a prank war with another school!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hell yeah! What'd you do? Cherry Bomb all their toilets? Slash all their tires? Soggy all their biscuits?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: No I swiped the fire safety plan off their wall! So if there's a fire they'll have no clue what to do!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Genius! I'll get the matches and a kerosine-tini.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What school was it?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Some kind of school for special kids or something.

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: I think you mean gifted youngsters.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: You started a prank war with the fucking X-Men?

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: If you just return the safety plan along with an apology I'd be willing to look the other way.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Lighten up Murderball we aint apologizing for shit.

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: I see so it's a prank war you're after, prepare to meet your demise.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Great. Thanks Jim, now we're all gonna get murdered in super specific ways.

entries.speaker: magneto
entries.line: Mutatis Mutandis!!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Whoa hold up man that is too far. That bucket coulda hit him right in the head.

entries.speaker: wolverine
entries.line: Oh but dildo claws is fair?! Jean, help me get rid of these things.

entries.speaker: jean_grey
entries.line: What's the rush?

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: Now, now I think it's time we all put this silliness behind us and go our separate ways before someone really gets hurt.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Dream on Professor X-lax, you and your group of X-lax Men-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Awful.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: -Aren't geting off that easy, this is war!

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: I was under the impression what we were just doing was the war.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: That was a prank war, NOW it's WAR-war!

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: Very well

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Not right now, c'mon, standard rumble rules apply, we both go back to our hideouts, get pumped up then meet up later.

entries.speaker: professor_x
entries.line: Of course. My mistake. Until morrow.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Hey was Erection Bill always sliced in half?

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: What's the matter? Are we out of biscuits?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: No thanks to Sonic we have to fight the X-Men.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: We're dead meat.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: I say we make a run for it. Hidin' and Biden!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey! what's all this lying around shit?!?

entries.speaker: proveloney_tony
entries.line: It's hopeless. I'm gonna call my mom.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yeah, well, some of us ain't got no Moms!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: It's too dangerous Sonic, college is over.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Nothing is over until we decide it is! Was it over when the Nazi's killed Walter White?!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Actually yes that was the end of the series, unless of course you're counting El Camino then--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What happened to the frat I used to know?

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: What are you talking about you've only been here for a day?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Nevertheless, where's the spirt? Where's the guts? Where's your MANA?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Oh, god dammit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh we're afraid to fight the X-Men, we're just gonna run back home like a bunch of scaredy cats. Well just kiss my ass from now on! Not me! I'm not gonna take this! Wolverine he's a deadman! Magneto dead! PROFESSOR X

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: FUCKING DEAD MAN! BURN THEIR CORPSES!!!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Oh shit, it's them. Hide.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Look, if we're gonna beat these guys we can't use conventional methods-

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Tail is right! Let's sacrifice these frat dudes!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Wait what?!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Hell yeah! Wait- what?

entries.speaker: proveloney_tony
entries.line: OH GOD NO! One of these guys literally has killer dreadlocks!

entries.speaker: frat_guys
entries.line: Ah! Your powers are either super specific or really broad and undefined!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Welp, I guess we run the frat now?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Fraternity is broke, remember?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: BIKINI CAR WASH!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: This was way easier. Alright I'm done with frat life, whats for lunch? Soggy biscuits?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: X-lax men.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Shut the fuck up!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Man, that party was crazy last night. I need some breakfast. I'm thinking flour, baking powder, sugar, milk, butter and one whole egg. Sifting the dry ingredients together, then adding the wet ingredients and stirring to combine.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Are you gonna list an entire recipe for making pancakes because I'm really not up for it

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Scoop the batter onto a hot griddle or pan-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Can we just talk about the elephant in the room.

entries.speaker: princess_potato
entries.line: Hey I'm not an elephant! Or am I? Oooh, this is a tough one Potato. Think it through. Think. It. Through.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I'm talking about that elephant.

entries.speaker: elephant
entries.line: I need someone to spell METH please.

entries.speaker: princess_potato
entries.line: Yeah I want in on that spelling contest.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: UGH Behind that actual elephant.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh that, I feel like Mario dies every other season, I'm sure he's fine.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: See.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Or not. Case closed. Pancake time!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: What the hell happened last night?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: I don't know I was pretty wasted. Last thing I remember was hooking up with this girl then she handcuffed me, after that I must have passed out.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: That's crazy! I was handcuffed to a girl too. And I can only assume I passed out from sex exhaustion.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Wait you don't think...

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: We both hooked up with super hot co-eds, passed out, got un-handcuffed from the co-eds, and then a responsible person handcuffed you and me together so we wouldn't do anything stupid like drink and drive and then they brought us to the quad because it's the central most location to both our dorms!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Hell yeah!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Sexin' and Flexin'!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What's your problem?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I think I'm having an identity crisis.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Is this more of a Jason Bourne identity crisis or like a gender thing? You gotta let me know, because that is NOT cool...They made TOO many of those Bourne movies.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I'm talking about finding my place in college, finding my place in the world. I feel like the walls are closing in on me--I don't belong. Maybe this is who I am, who I was all along.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Easy there Pete Wentz, I'm still nauseous from last night.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: That's it! I'll be the sensitive, soulful, singer songwriter, who always has a guitar and notebook to write lyrics.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I'm already annoyed. Again, just don't Season-4 this Season-9 please.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Hello boys Luigi here.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey what happened to your voice?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yeah everybody keeps asking why your voice is different now.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Like, I don't hear it, ya know?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yeah I dunno. Continue.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: You may have heard my brother Mario was murdered.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey he showed up at our door already dead. All we did was use his corpse to soak up some puke.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: And then he was all pukey, so we hosed him off. Which made the hallway all slippery.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: So then we used him as a sled for the hallway slip n slide. But then Tails called security right after that.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I didn't call security.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: We'll call security after our breakfast...nap.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Using my brother as a Wonder Mop aside, I know you're innocent. I'm here to let you know that I'm the new boss in town.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Phew! I thought with Mario dead other bad guys would show up and the whole season would devolve into some sort of rehash we've done a million times before. But with a clown like you in charge, no offense, we can go on doing a bunch of college shit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: So Tails you know everybody hates the guitar--

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Does a clown have a gun like this?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: SHUT UP the both of you! It's a real gun. And I'll put a real bullet in your head if you don't start winning some championships.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I thought the deal was Mario was gonna kill my dead owl mom.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: What am I an idiot?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yes.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Your dead owl mom is already dead and unless you want to join her, I'd get to winning.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Welp I'm outta here. Need to get me a guitar and come up with a cool name for it. I'm thinking Eleanor or String...Mouth. Later.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ok you win, you win. The Track and Field National Championships are tonight... for some reason. It's in the bag.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I need something that rhymes with "I like you as a friend that you text once-a-year to check in on as a courtesy because you feel bad" (notices EWJ and KNUCKLES) Jim? Knuckles? What are you guys doing here? Why are you handcuffed?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: What's with the guitar? You think you're Ringo Star or something?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: All we know is

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: we don't know

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: If you suck-seed

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: you won't grow

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Terrible. If I could give sound diarrhea until it died, I would do it.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What do you know you're the establishment man.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Speaking of the establishment you hear Mario was murdered on campus? Security has no leads but I was asking around and I stumbled on an interesting paper trail. You see-

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Eggman Eggman - We got a lot happening this season. We don't have time for your storyline.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Yeah Eggman, now if you'll excuse us Jim and I have to get out of these handcuffs so we can find the girls we met last night and ask them out on a proper date.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Real life ain't taught in classes.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: So dont educate the masses

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: What the hell are you doing? Run!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey you don't see me telling you how to win the plumber competition or whatever the fuck your game is about.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: There. You happy? Now can I go back to college life? You know partying, eventually falling for a girl under false pretenses, getting made for a fraud, pulling my act together, winning the girl back and graduating?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Yes. After you win the championship. The 100 meter dash was just one event.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Pffft. How hard could it be.

entries.speaker: pa_announcer
entries.line: Next event is javelin

entries.speaker: princess_potato
entries.line: No good.

entries.speaker: elephant
entries.line: Trash.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Fuck.

entries.speaker: v
entries.line: Previously on Sonic For Hire

entries.speaker: o
entries.line: Previously on Sonic For Hire

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Come gather round viewers

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: And watch Part 2

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Sonic's in trouble

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: That's nothing new

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Now Luigi's the boss

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Eggman doesn't have a clue

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What about Knuckles and Jim

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: They're so confused

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Ohh the season's halfway over--

entries.speaker: referee
entries.line: As much as I appreciate that, you're disqualified.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Worth it.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Sonic, what's going on here? I thought you were gonna dominate. You're embarrassing me in front of my friends.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Is that Rygar? Who the fuck is friends with Rygar?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Rygar was ahead of his time!

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Would you just win this thing so we can both look good. Otherwise, Bullet Bill is gonna bullet kill.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Yeah no problem I think there's finally gonna be some actual track and field events and not these stupid hillbilly competitions.

entries.speaker: referee
entries.line: Next up Archery!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: COME ON!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: We got to figure out a way to track down those girls we made out with.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: If only there was someone who could give us some advice.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Yeah, a real dirtbag with a ton of experience in stalking women.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: It couldn't be just any dirtbag though, we need the lowest of the lowlifes.

entries.speaker: thunderhead
entries.line: Ahem.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: That's still not enough, in order to track those girls down this person has to be so despicable, so shameless, so devoid of any morals he'd step over his own mother just for the chance at looking up a girls skirt.

entries.speaker: thunderhead
entries.line: I literally just did that. Would you guys get the hell in here already?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: That is how we do it!

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: What the hell are you talking about you were disqualified!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: I know but I broke Tails guitar again.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I don't need a guitar to make art, not when there's a harmonica in my pocket and revolution in the air!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Hey Jeffery Tambor you were canceled off TV / You were creepy and wanted to show off your weiner / Hey Jeffery Tambor you were canceled off TV / But you will live on in streaming as George Sr.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Alright you gotta focus here. Maybe stop shooting Tails with stuff. Take a deep breath, relax...

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: the 100M hurdles is about to start GO!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh shit!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Done. We're National Champs. Oh and I got you this ice cream cone...

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: from Switzerland.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Mmm, Swiss Cheese Swirl!

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: You're gonna make this school a lot of money! Of course, you'll see none of it, and we'll vilify you if you take a dime!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Seems fair.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Now go enjoy the spoils of being a big time college athlete.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: What the hell? Is this place a bad Real Genius reference no one will get?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Yeah are we almost there?

entries.speaker: thunderhead
entries.line: How should know I accidentally flushed my favorite butt plug down the toilet and it's got to be here somewhere.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: That's it I'm turning back.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Stop, listen. I hear girls.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Oh shit. And it also looks like we're underneath the Delta Pi Cliched Pun Sorority House.

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Hey Apple how about those two super hot guys last night?!

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: They're talking about uuuuuusssss!

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Totally Fedora! And what about those other two guys who handcuffed themselves to each other and started making out in the middle of the party?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Wait...

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Oh you mean Kale and Flannel? Yeah they're always showing how comfortable they are with their sexuality.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Did we call ourselves Kale and Flannel last night?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: No fucking clue.

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Oh look at the time, we're late for our 3:15 lingerie pillow fight

entries.speaker: thunderhead
entries.line: That's all I can stand and I can't stands no more!!

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: EW! That perverted degenerate dwarf is back!

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Whoa not cool Apple.

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: No, dwarf is acceptable.

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Oh okay didn't want to offend him.

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Hey guys! What are you doing here?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: So that WAS us. We did make out last night.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Gotta say. I didn't hate it.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: What rhymes with "sexual awakening"?

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Wait you guys don't remember last night?

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: Apple and I were coming back from Thong practice when we bumped into you two party animals. So we handcuffed ourselves to each of you, made out for a couple hours then after we took off the handcuffs, Responsible Rachel came along and handcuffed you two together and brought you to the quad because it's the central most location to both of your dorms.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Ohhhh. Okay.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Ohhhh. Okay.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Hey they found a drop of Mario's blood in the Dean's office--

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Ugh there's no time for you Eggman we're already running long.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: But what about Sonic's storyline that didn't seem finished.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Part 3 Eggman Part 3.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: How many parts must this episode have / Before it will freakin' end / How many championships must Sonic win / I guess it will all depend / Yes and how many subplots will Knuckles and Jim endure / Before we see the season descend / The answers my friends have yet to be penned / The answers haven't been penned.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Hey Tails wait till I tell you what's going with this Mario murder, at first the Dean was the lead suspect, but now the police suspect it could be OJ!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What are you talking about?

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: You know Burt O'Jay the orange juice delivery man. He's been delivering orange juice to this campus for 32 years. 32 Tails. Then I started thinking about the number 32 and-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Ugh get lost Eggman we don't have time for your storyline that's why it wasn't in the song.

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: Your songs suck! This is bullshit!

entries.speaker: eggman
entries.line: No time for my storyline but all the time in the world for your dumbass songs and costume changes.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Thank you, thank you, I love you too but I really got to get going to class--BEAT--Kidding! Let's go get drunk and stupid!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Oh great it's Tails. If he starts singing would someone please jam a hot poker in my ear?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: With pleasure!! Wait, where am I gonna get a hot poker?

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Let's see, there's Poker Palace on Main Street, if you keep going down Main there's Poker Poker Poker and the next town over is Big Al's Poker Emporium--if you see Big Al tell'em Knuckles sent you and he'll give you 10% off...that or kick you in the nads.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You're an idiot Knuckles. BEAT There's a Poker City right off campus.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Shut up all of you! You're not gonna need any pokers, I gave up the whole singer songwriter thing.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: What happened you realized you sucked? Because you did. You sucked so bad.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Nah I got a letter from Bob Dylan's lawyers they said to stop or they'll jam hot pokers in their ears...after they sue me. But now I need another identity.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Yeah well we haven't exactly found ourselves in college yet either. Hey Sonic you're a big star now can you help us out.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: One big star. Three idiot friends. You know what I'm thinking--

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: What?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You didn't hear that?

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Hear what?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh I guess that was just in my head. The Entourage theme song played. You guys can be my Entourage.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Ah there it is

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You heard that one? Ok cool.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Look I told you Sonic writes and directs this thing or he's out.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: I want to smoke weed and play video games.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Uhh something stupid about how I used to be sorta famous. (disgruntled aside) I really think I should be Turtle.

entries.speaker: party_person_1
entries.line: Hey look who made it!

entries.speaker: party_person_2
entries.line: We look like those frat guys from earlier!

entries.speaker: party_person_3
entries.line: Sonic get your ass over here and do a keg stand!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Step aside losers and let me show you how it's done...(confused on what a keg stand is) after uh you show me how it's done...

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Ah I don't wanna be a Tails here, but I'm pretty sure every time you party, something bad happens.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yeah Tails is right, plus you have a big track meet tomorrow, if you blow it the Dean will throw you out of school--or is it Luigi? Whatever someone will be pissed.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You know how many track meets I've won after doing keg stands all night? BEAT Actually none but what can possibly go wrong.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I dunno, you fall over and knock the lighter out of the kids hand who is lighting a bong and it falls into and ignites the punch bowl of grain alcohol that gets spilled onto the floor by the stolen kangaroo mascot of a rival school and the entire dorm goes on fire meanwhile you hurt your back and are unable to spin dash and win the race thus getting you thrown out of college?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: In your dreams!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: It WAS a dream. Remember when that witch cursed me?

entries.speaker: witch
entries.line: HAHAHAHAHAHA!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Get the hell out of here Esmerelda!

entries.speaker: witch
entries.line: Whatever. Anybody got rolling papers?

entries.speaker: person_1
entries.line: I do!

entries.speaker: witch
entries.line: Broooo-ooo-oo-o-o-o

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Welcome to keg stand city. Population me!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: And something bad happens in 5,4,3,2--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh my god I fell over and knocked the lighter out of the kids hand that was lighting a bong and it fell into and ignited the punch bowl of grain alcohol and it spilled onto the floor by the stolen kangaroo mascot of a rival school and the entire dorm is on fire meanwhile I hurt my back and am unable to spin dash and win the race thus getting me thrown out of college!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: You never learn. C'mon let's get outta here.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: How the hell am I gonna win if I can't spin dash.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: Maybe you don't need the spin dash. In the movies this is where the gimmick doesn't work so the character digs down and is able to win the game as himself with no tricks. This is your moment Sonic, this is your moment to show the world you're more than just a one trick pony, that you have integrity and resolve. You'll win the respect of everyone and feel better for it!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You're right Jim. I WILL cheat.

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I do know where you can get the power to spin dash.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ohhh right watch Boobie Miles in Friday Night Lights the movie! "If you wanna win, put me in, let Boobie spin!"

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Spinnin' and grinnin!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Why wouldn't you use winning? I just said it.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Shit, you're right. Okay start over. Wow! We're roommates Sonic

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ugh, you went back too far! What were you saying Tails?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I'm talking about where you get the 2nd best spin dash in the world.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Don't. even. think it--

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Metroid.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: There it is.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey sweetie. Daddy needs you to keep that terrifying mouth closed okay?

entries.speaker: soniqua
entries.line: DADDY!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Shhhh

entries.speaker: soniqua
entries.line: You finally went to college and it took you til episode 8 to get me into the series? I'm the most beloved character in the entire series, seriously what the fuck is wrong with you?!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What'd you say?!

entries.speaker: soniqua
entries.line: Avocado?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Look I'll put you into more episodes you just have to be quiet I don't want to wake up--

entries.speaker: mother_brain
entries.line: If it isn't my favorite spikey head--and your haircut isn't bad either!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ugh. I don't have time Mother Brian I really just came over to get a spin dash power up.

entries.speaker: mother_brain
entries.line: You know what they say if you wanna spin--you gotta put my bobbies in... your mouth.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: That's what I get for watching that movie with her. Fine.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Okay now which of these things are your boobies again?

entries.speaker: mother_brain
entries.line: They ALL are!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Oh god, here I go...

entries.speaker: soniqua
entries.line: Ava-gross-o!

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I go by the name of Miles Power I'm with my crew and we bout to show y'all what we be snackin' on ya dig--

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yes. Yup, that didn't feel right here either. Better off anyway that's the only line I really had.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Sonic, it's very important you win this race.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: Exactly if you don't win I'm gonna kill youuuu-r GPA the way I killed Mario--

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: So it was YOU who killed my brother! I knew it!...Just now.

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: You didn't let me finish, the way I killed Mario at badminton.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Oh yeah he really sucks at badminton.

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Uh Sonic shouldn't you be running?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Fuck.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Time to give this race the ol' screwgie.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Sorry! That's me, my bad. Fuck. Shit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Did I win?

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: No Sonic. No you did not win.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Was it because of all the bombs and dismemberment?

entries.speaker: announcer
entries.line: Sonic has been disqualified because of all the bombs and dismemberment

entries.speaker: luigi
entries.line: Yes.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: So does this mean I'm kicked out of school?

entries.speaker: dean_cain
entries.line: I've decided just this second to let you stay but you have to work as a the janitor... seeing how you killed the janitor.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Ooh! Free small soda, here I come!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Hey who's the asshole throwing sodas?!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Heh, whats this a Nintendo save code? Heh heh. I'm so old.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Let's see, carry the 2...

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Hey! Stop! You can't be vandalizing other people's work!

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: I can't believe it! That's impossible!

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Watch this fellas I'm gonna go pick up that girl over there.

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Hey baby aren't you in my History class?

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: I think I am! Do you want to be study partners? We can do some Readin' and Breedin'

entries.speaker: knuckles
entries.line: Wha-Oh my god! You're the only other person I've ever heard talk like that - My name's Knuc-

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Excuse me! This guy bothering you?

entries.speaker: sorority_girls
entries.line: No, not at all

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: I didn't know you studied history Knuckles. If you're so smart, why don't you explain to us...

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Is there a problem here... Tails is that you? You look fucking ridiculous.

entries.speaker: earthworm_jim
entries.line: We're you Lil Tail-Z earlier today?

entries.speaker: tails
entries.line: Yeah Lil Tail-Z was dead on arrival. It's Preston now. So why don't you mop my floors while I continue this original Good Will Hunting parody.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: You think that's original? I'll show you original...

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: How do you like them apples!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Aw man, where'd you get that harmonica?

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Did everybody get harmonicas?

entries.speaker: guard
entries.line: Hedgehog. You're free to go.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Not right now, I got a hot lead on some sweet harmonicas.

entries.speaker: wiley
entries.line: Hello Sonic.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: What's this all about Wiley?

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: I bailed you out so I can help you live up to your full potential.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Really? Nobody's ever cared that much before.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Oh shit, I was only fucking around. We really just want to exploit your genius for the University's benefit.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Wait are you supposed to be that German teacher guy or Robin Williams?

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Eh for time sake a little bit of both I guess. Now let me tell you a seemingly irrelevant but poignant Boston Red Sox anecdote.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: No thanks, can you just explain what you want me to do so I can get the hell out of here.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Fine. We've been stuck on this impossible problem that nobody's been able to crack. If you can figure it out Dean Cain said he'll let you back in school.

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Deal. So give me the question that nobody's been able to figure out--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Where's Waldo?

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: You see?! You see?! It's hopeless!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Seriously? It looks pretty simple to me.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Ok hot shot, but I got to warn you that--

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Done.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Wait what?

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Oh THAT'S Waldo?! I thought Waldo was a Chinese woman!

entries.speaker: sonic
entries.line: Sure. So we good?

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Yes, yes you magnificent son of a bitch, you did it, I guess I'll see you in class on Monday.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Gotta go see about a Chinese woman.

entries.speaker: dr_wiley
entries.line: Son of a bitch stole my line...and my wallet. Fuck.
